statements: SELECT id, product_name, manufacturer_name FROM SupplyChainData;
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE manufacturer_name = 'ABC Inc.';
SELECT product_name, batch_number, expiration_date FROM SupplyChainData WHERE production_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT serial_number, location FROM SupplyChainData WHERE expiration_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, manufacturer_name, blockchain_hash FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer_name, expiration_date FROM SupplyChainData WHERE location = 'Warehouse A';
SELECT * FROM SupplyChainData WHERE production_date > '2022-01-01' AND expiration_date < '2022-12-31' ORDER BY expiration_date DESC;
SELECT manufacturer_name, COUNT(id) AS total_records FROM SupplyChainData GROUP BY manufacturer_name HAVING total_records > 5 ORDER BY total_records DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT manufacturer_name FROM SupplyChainData ORDER BY manufacturer_name ASC;
SELECT id, product_name, serial_number FROM SupplyChainData WHERE blockchain_hash IS NOT NULL AND batch_number LIKE '%ABC%' ORDER BY production_date ASC, expiration_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals;
SELECT product_id, product_name, manufacturer FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals WHERE expiry_date > '2022-12-31';
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(id) AS total_count FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals GROUP BY manufacturer;
SELECT product_name, expiry_date FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals WHERE expiry_date < '2023-06-30';
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_medical_devices ORDER BY manufacturing_date DESC;
SELECT id, product_id, manufacturer, manufacturing_date FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals WHERE expiry_date > CURRENT_DATE
SELECT * FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer'
SELECT product_id, product_name, batch_number FROM supply_chain_pharmaceuticals ORDER BY product_name ASC
SELECT id, device_name, serial_number FROM supply_chain_medical_devices WHERE manufacturing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30'
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM supply_chain_medical_devices GROUP BY manufacturer
SELECT * FROM pharmaceuticals ORDER BY product_name DESC;
SELECT id, manufacturer, production_date FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer';
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE production_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer = 'Medtronics' ORDER BY device_name ASC;
SELECT device_name, serial_number FROM medical_devices WHERE id = 3;
SELECT id, product_name, manufacturer, production_date FROM pharmaceuticals;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company' ORDER BY device_name DESC;
SELECT transaction_id, transaction_date, transaction_type FROM supply_chain_transactions WHERE transaction_type='shipment' ORDER BY transaction_date DESC;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer FROM pharmaceuticals JOIN supply_chain_transactions ON pharmaceuticals.id = supply_chain_transactions.product_id WHERE sender_id=1001;
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_devices FROM medical_devices GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_devices > 5 ORDER BY total_devices DESC;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceuticals;
SELECT name, manufacturer FROM medical_devices WHERE type = 'Surgical';
SELECT manufacturer, production_date FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE expiry_date > '2023-01-01';
SELECT id, location, timestamp FROM supply_chain ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT * FROM blockchain_network WHERE data LIKE '%transaction%' LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE manufacturer = 'Pfizer'
SELECT id, name, production_date FROM pharmaceuticals ORDER BY production_date DESC
SELECT name, expiry_date FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE expiry_date < '2023-01-01'
SELECT manufacturer, COUNT(*) AS total_count FROM pharmaceuticals GROUP BY manufacturer HAVING total_count > 1
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE type = 'MRI Machine'
SELECT * FROM pharmaceuticals;
SELECT product_name, manufacturer, expiration_date FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT device_name, manufacturer, release_date FROM medical_devices ORDER BY release_date DESC;
SELECT tracking_history.timestamp, tracking_history.transaction_type, pharmaceuticals.product_name FROM tracking_history JOIN pharmaceuticals ON tracking_history.batch_id = pharmaceuticals.id;
SELECT node_name, network_address FROM blockchain_network WHERE node_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM pharmaceuticals ORDER BY expiration_date DESC, manufacturer ASC;
SELECT product_name, batch_number, manufacturer FROM pharmaceuticals WHERE expiration_date > CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT * FROM medical_devices WHERE release_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30' ORDER BY manufacturer ASC;
SELECT device_name, serial_number FROM medical_devices WHERE manufacturer='ABC Company' AND serial_number LIKE 'SN-%';

SELECT th.timestamp, p.product_name, md.device_name, th.transaction_type FROM tracking_history th JOIN pharmaceuticals p ON th.batch_id=p.id JOIN medical_devices md ON th.device_id=md.id ORDER BY th.timestamp DESC;
